text:
[Verse]
Sun goes down lights come up bright
City glows it's our night
Running wild hearts untied free
Dancing through the streets we flee

[Verse 2]
Colors splash the sky so high
Laughter echoes you and I
Every step a brand new beat
Feel the rhythm in our feet

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams chase the dark away
Nighttime whispers come what may
Under stars where dreams ignite
We'll find magic in the night

[Verse 3]
Waves of time they ebb and flow
In this moment let it go
Hands in hand we write our song
Lost in night where we belong

[Bridge]
Echoes of our laughter loud
Stars that paint the twilight proud
Every heartbeat syncs as one
Until we see the rising sun

[Chorus]
Sunset dreams chase the dark away
Nighttime whispers come what may
Under stars where dreams ignite
We'll find magic in the night
title: Sunset Dreams
